definition: to feed (a child, domestic animal etc)/to keep/to raise (an animal)
hey/to feed (an animal, baby, invalid etc)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Give no artificial teats or pacifiers (also called dummies or soothers) to breastfeeding infants.
sentences.chinese: 对母乳喂养的婴儿不要使用人工奶嘴或橡皮奶头。

sentences.english: Community health workers should be aware of the specialized issues around infant feeding.
sentences.chinese: 社区卫生工作者应了解有关婴儿喂养的专门问题。

sentences.english: She fed the baby on pureed carrots .
sentences.chinese: 她用胡萝卜泥喂养那婴儿。

sentences.english: He raised those goats from new-born kids.
sentences.chinese: 那些羊从小羊羔时就是他喂养的。

sentences.english: There she sits and feeds her young.
In addition, certain hormonal changes during breast-feeding may contribute to bone-density loss.
sentences.chinese: 另外，母乳喂养期间激素的变化也会使骨密度降低。

sentences.english: Later they developed a technique for feeding the larvae and rearing them to spat.
sentences.chinese: 后来他们发展了一项技术来喂养幼贝至其长成贝苗。

sentences.english: Can continuous pump feeding reduce the incidence of pneumonia in nasogastric tube-fed patients?A randomized controlled trial.
sentences.chinese: 持续泵入喂养能否减少鼻饲患者肺炎发生率？

sentences.english: Most pediatricians recommend starting with an iron-fortified cereal.
sentences.chinese: 大多数儿科医生建议给宝宝喂养含铁的谷物。

sentences.english: Damselfish use the resulting gardens of algae for feeding and producing young.
sentences.chinese: 少女鱼利用肥沃的海藻来喂养和生产幼仔。

sentences.english: After washing the feeding and preparation equipment, rinse thoroughly in safe water.
sentences.chinese: 在清洗喂养和配制器具后，再用安全饮水彻底冲洗。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effect of breast-feeding on infectious disease of infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母乳喂养对婴儿患感染性疾病的影响。

sentences.english: What do you feed the poultry on?
sentences.chinese: 你们用什么饲料喂养家禽？

sentences.english: Only bottle-fed infants show reactions to cow-milk proteins.
sentences.chinese: 只有用牛奶喂养的婴儿才会对牛奶蛋白有反应。

sentences.english: Fully-vented bottle design for vacuum-free feeding similar to breastfeeding.
sentences.chinese: 全真空奶瓶设计如同母乳喂养。

sentences.english: I can feed you for all eternity.
sentences.chinese: 我可以喂养你直到永生。

definition: to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
to breed (livestock, fish, crops etc)/to grow/to raise
to forage/to gather for eating/to pick and eat
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
